softredir-desc: Adds the tag __SOFTREDIR__ to mark [[Special:SoftRedirectPages|soft redirect pages]]
softredirectpages-summary:
The following is a list of all soft redirect pages on {{SITENAME}}.
A page is treated as a soft redirect page if it contains the tag __SOFTREDIR__ (or an equivalent alias).
softredirectpagelinks: Pages linking to soft redirect pages
softredirectpagelinks-summary:
The following pages contain at least one link to a soft redirect page. They may need to link to a more appropriate page instead.
A page is treated as a soft redirect page if it contains the tag __SOFTREDIR__ (or an equivalent alias).
visualeditor-dialog-meta-settings-softre: This is a soft redirect page
